overview:
Mr. Jeff Crisan is a Managing Director at Bain Capital Ventures. Prior to joining Bain Capital Ventures in 2002, Mr. Crisan worked in Bain Capital’s Private Equity group, focusing primarily on technology and healthcare investments, including software, semiconductors, telecommunications, business services, and healthcare services. Prior to Bain Capital in 1998, Mr. Crisan was a consultant with Bain & Company.

Mr. Crisan received an MBA with Distinction from Harvard Business School and a BA magna cum laude, Phi Beta Kappa in Mathematics and Government from Dartmouth College.
